title: Lake Clark National Park & Preserve: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery               Photo Gallery       Â                 Glaciers   6 Photos  Glaciers in Lake Clark National Park.          Lake Clark's Brown Bears   16 Photos  This photo gallery hightlights brown bears utilizing a variety of habitats in Lake Clark, from tidal flats and salt marshes to lake shores and salmon-bearing rivers.          People in the Park   30 Photos  People in the Park            Plants in Lake Clark   20 Photos  Images of common plants found in Lake Clark National Park and Preserve          Scenery   35 Photos  Photographs of Lake Clark National Park & Preserve.          Wildlife   28 Photos  Wildlife in Lake Clark National Park & Preserve            Chinitna Bay   16 Photos  Browse photos of Chinitna Bay on Lake Clark National Park's Cook Inlet coast where you might see as many as 20 brown bears from a single location. This estuary is tucked into a protected bay with spectacular mountain views, wide open beaches, large salt marshes, and excellent clamming.          Crescent Lake   11 Photos  Browse photos of Crescent Lake.          Silver Salmon Creek   8 Photos  Images of Silver Salmon Creek in Lake Clark            Kontrabishuna Lake   4 Photos  Images from around Kontrabishuna Lake.          Wildfire   9 Photos  Check out photos of wildfires in Lake Clark
